message_1:
What is the median of the following dataset (in ascending order)? 

12, 15, 17, 18, 20, 22, 25, 30, 49, 50.
message_2:
To find the median of a dataset, we first need to make sure the numbers are in ascending order, which they are in this case. Since there are 10 numbers in this dataset, we will find the average of the two middle numbers (5th and 6th numbers) to get the median.

The 5th number is 20 and the 6th number is 22. The average of these two numbers is:

(20 + 22) / 2 = 42 / 2 = 21

So, the median of this dataset is 21.
